1.title: Thunderous visitor
1.plot: Ryousuke, a young man who has had a childhood fear of thunder recalls how his mother once told him when he was five, that she will protect him from thunder. Five months later, she moved out, so now he lives with his father. Suddenly, he experiences a blackout in his apartment.

2.title: Tomonashi Cave
2.plot: A group of high school students are taking part of a tour in the Tomonashi Cave. The tour guide says that it's believed that the wind blowing in the cave can sound like a young girl's cry.

3.title: The Wind's Warning
3.plot: A salary man, Hide, has just returned home to his apartment when he feels the wind blow. He enters his room and finds the balcony door wide open.

4.title: Swamp Offering
4.plot: A couple who has just recently married moves to a village in the countryside where the husband once lived as a child.

1.title: Ofuda onna
1.plot: This is the story of a man who had just moved into a particular apartment.

2.title: Zanbai
2.plot: This is the story of a man who went to a particular village in the country on a business trip.

3.title: Kakun
3.plot: This is the story of a boy named Toshiharu who moved back to the country with his parents.

4.title: Kami
4.plot: This is the story of a teacher at a particular elementary school who had to work a bit late one day.

5.title: Ikai
5.plot: This is the story of a particular family that went shopping for their young son's birthday present at a department store.

6.title: Amidana
6.plot: This is the story of a particular man who did nothing but work, work, work, day in and day out.

7.title: Mujun

10.title: Tsuki
10.plot: This is a story about the members of a particular high school baseball team staying in a lodge for training camp.

11.title: Bideo
11.plot: This is a story that three middle school students experienced on the last day of summer vacation.

12.title: Tomonari-kun
12.plot: This is the story of a high school girl and some young boys who lived in a particular housing complex.

13.title: Uzuki
13.plot: This is the story of a particular group of boys attending an elementary school in the country.

1.title: Tongue
1.plot: A business on his way home from work spots a cat lying lifelessly in the road after being hit by a car. He carries it to the sidewalk, but it's clearly beyond help, so he makes a grave for it and heads home. That night, while relaxing at home, he hears what sounds like a kitten's cry.

2.title: Fish Tank
2.plot: A boy in middle school learns of a creepy old house near his school. He decides to check it out and, once inside, discovers a large fish tank in one room. Curious to know what's in it, he cautiously peers through the glass.

3.title: Sewing Shears
3.plot: A young woman in college has moved into a certain old apartment building. As she is unpacking her belongings, she sees a spot on the wooden floor where a mismatched board has been added. Curious, she lifts the board to find a dirt surface with a pair of rusty scissors stuck in the ground -

4.title: Red High Heel
4.plot: A business has missed the last train after working overtime. He tries to hail a taxi some distance from the train station, but is unable to catch one. As he's wondering what he should do, he spots a vacant taxi racing along an empty street at high speed and finally manages to catch a ride.

5.title: Night Bus
5.plot: A group of college students sets off on a night bus to go on vacation. On the way, one of them develops a stomachache and asks the driver to stop at a service area along the highway. But when he returns from the bathroom, the atmosphere inside the bus is very different..

6.title: Guess Who?
6.plot: A high school student is visiting an amusement park with an older member of her club, whom she has a crush on. She's thrilled at the prospect of going on this date with the senpai she admires. But on the way home, they see a creepy woman on the train platform, and from that point onward, the girl's head is overtaken by a frightening suspicion.

7.title: Footsteps
7.plot: A husband, after finally receiving some time off, accompanies his wife on a shopping trip. Along the way, he receives an invitation from a friend to go out for drinks. To avoid upsetting his wife, he replies to his friend in a bathroom stall, but then he notices some creepy writing on the wall.

8.title: Cassette Tape
8.plot: A man has returned to his hometown to attend the wedding of a friend from elementary school. To please his family, he arrives a day early to stay at his parents' home the night before. As he's marveling at how his childhood bedroom hasn't changed at all, he discovers a cassette tape in a desk drawer labeled "What Happened Today" and decides to listen to it.

9.title: Grinding Teeth
9.plot: An office lady uses some of her paid leave to go on a trip with her coworkers, but during the trip, she develops a toothache. Hoping to get it fixed even though she's on vacation, she visits a local, old-looking dental clinic. The dentist takes one look at her tooth and shoves pliers into her mouth to pull it without asking for her approval.

10.title: Calling Crane
10.plot: Some middle school girls are staying over at a classmate's house. At school that day, the girls had agreed to perform a ritual at the sleepover that they believe will let them speak to the dead.

11.title: White Line
11.plot: A new teacher is staying after school grading tests for her class. When she glances out the window, she sees a student in an unfamiliar, old-looking school uniform, laying white powder lines in the schoolyard.

12.title: Snow Hut
12.plot: A boy in elementary school has been brought to the snowy country by his parents to visit his grandparents over winter break. He doesn't often see snow, so he's overjoyed to have snowball fights and build snow huts with his cousin. Then, in a grove of trees, they find a snow hut with no entrance.

13.title: Underground Walkway
13.plot: A college student is caught in a sudden rainfall on the way home from a night out drinking. He attempts to take shelter until the rain stops, but discovers an underground path to the train station and heads down it.

1.title: Wrong Number
1.plot: A young woman realized her dream and married an elite businessman. However, contrary to her ideal, her new husband works so much that he has no time for his family, and things aren't going as smoothly as she'd imagined with her new stepchild.

2.title: Give It to Me
2.plot: The story of a certain office lady. On her way home from work, she meets a young girl in the park who persistently asks her to give her things. The moment she begins to see her past self in this young girl, things take a frightening turn. Can she escape the darkness of material desire?

3.title: The Crow Children
3.plot: The story of a woman and her young daughter visiting family in the countryside. On the way there, they meet a somewhat eerie-looking old woman dressed all in black, and this meeting entangles the mother and daughter in something disturbing.

4.title: Copycat
4.plot: The story of two girls who have been together in all things since they were children. Yukari has always been the type who wanted to do everything her best friend Haru did. It's unclear whether she acts out of envy, love, or madness, but her feelings become a darkness that leads to a tragic fate.

5.title: Shadows of Women
5.plot: The story of a woman who wishes for happiness after getting married. However, her husband always comes home late from work, leaving her feeling doubtful.

6.title: Giveback-sama
6.plot: A high school girl is heartbroken after her boyfriend left her for her best friend. She's still in shock when she stumbles upon a book of incantations. One incantation in its pages sucks her into a whirlpool of terror.

7.title: Hide-and-Seek
7.plot: The story of a family visiting the countryside. The grandma tells her grandson Takeshi that he must not go near the house with the mountain behind it. But Takeshi, during a game of hide-and-seek with his cousins, disobeys his grandma and enters the forbidden house. From there, Takeshi is led into a world of darkness.

13.title: Seductress
13.plot: Instead of the usual opening, the story begins with a detective following the case of the disappearance of young men in a local area. The trail leads to the Mantis Bar where eyewitnesses say they made contact with a particular woman. A woman, whom the man she's with claims to be an actress, tells his date she wants him. While a young man drinks his beverage in slight jealousy, the detective from earlier watches the pair outside. Soon, the woman comes back and finds the young man still at his seat. She explains she got stood up, and the young man says he knew since he ...

imdb.plot outline: Every week at 5 p.m. an old man in a yellow mask shows up at a children's playground and tells them ghost stories based on myths and urban legends of Japanese origin. The man tells the stories on the back of his bicycle using a traditional kamishibai (Paper Drama) method and features a new tale each week.
imdb.title: Yami shibai
plot: Every week at 5 p.m. an old man in a yellow mask shows up at a children's playground and tells them ghost stories based on myths and urban legends of Japanese origin. The man tells the stories on the back of his bicycle using a traditional kamishibai (Paper Drama) method and features a new tale each week.
